edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.model.scrum_backlog

Class ScrumBacklogModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.model.scrum_backlog.ScrumBacklogModel

  • public class ScrumBacklogModel
extends java.lang.Object
    ScrumBacklogModel controls the creation and modification of TaskItemLists. Provides info to the GUI
    Author:
    sarahworley
